data.name: Demo_Forbidden_Message
data.value: Sorry, but we can't allow certain things in demo mode. To continue, you'll need to sign up for a real Takeoff account. We hope you do! It only takes seconds and there's no credit card required.
data.comment: {0} is link for them to sign up.

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_AssetAllTimeCount
data.value: you can't upload more asset files

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_AssetCount
data.value: you can't upload more asset files

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_AssetFileSize
data.value: you can't upload a file that big

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_AssetTotalSize
data.value: you can't upload more asset files

data.name: Account_LimitReached_Demo_Explanation
data.value: You're currently in a demo. In the demo, {0}. In order to do it, we need you to {1}sign up{/1}. No credit card required!
data.comment: {0} is a description of the limitation that was exceeded. {1} is the link to sign up for an account.

data.name: Account_LimitReached_Normal_Explanation
data.value: With your current account plan, {0}. You can {1}upgrade your account{/1} to fix the problem.
data.comment: {0} is a description of the limitation that was exceeded. {1} is the link to update to a better plan

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_ProductionCount
data.value: you reached the maximum number of productions

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_VideoFileSize
data.value: you can't upload a video that big

data.comment: {0} is link for them to sign up.

data.value: There are {0} days left in your trial. {1}Purchase Takeoff now!{/1}
data.comment: {0} is # of days left. {1} is signup link

data.name: LinkDoesNotApplyMsg
data.value: This link doesn't apply to you. Maybe it worked in the past or it works for someone else, but in your situation you don't need to worry about it.

data.value: Your account couldn't be created because:

data.value: Must be a valid e-mail address.

data.name: Nav_HomeBtn_Text

data.name: Production_Details_MustLogInHeader
data.value: Before you can access this production, we need you to log in.

data.name: AccountPlan_Model_AllowSignups
data.comment: If not, the plan is private or deprecated and must be set by admin

data.name: AccountPlan_Model_AssetsAllTimeMaxCount
data.value: Max number of lifetime assets (for demo)

data.value: Max # of Asset Files At Once

data.comment: {0} is link to new production

data.name: Login_Validation_SummaryHeading
data.value: Sorry but we couldn't log you in because:

data.name: Login_Validation_EmailNotFound
data.value: Sorry but there is nobody with that email in our system.

data.name: PasswordResetRequest_PageHeading
data.value: Forgot your password? Let's Reset It!

data.name: Validation_SummaryHeading
data.value: Your request couldn't be processed because:
data.comment: This is a default that many pages override.

data.name: PasswordReset_InvalidLinkDetails
data.value: Sorry but the link you opened is not right. The easiest fix is to {0}enter your e-mail address{/0} to start over.

data.name: PasswordReset_InvalidLinkPageHeading
data.value: We can't reset your password just yet!

data.name: PasswordResetRequestSent_Text
data.value: An email has been sent to you with a special link that will let you create a new password. If it doesn't appear within a few minutes, please check your junk mail. If you still have problems, please email us at support@takeoffvideo.com.

data.name: PasswordResetRequest_UserNotFound_Text
data.value: Sorry but we couldn't find anyone in our system with that email address.
data.comment: 0 is link back to password reset. 1 is signup.

data.name: PasswordReset_PasswordConfirmLabel
data.comment: Label for password confirmation

data.name: PasswordReset_PasswordLabel
data.comment: Label for Password field in form

data.name: Account_VerifyRequest_Explanation
data.value: In order to unlock certain features, we need to confirm that you own the email address you entered. It's simple. Enter your email address, and we'll send an email with a special link for you to click.

data.name: Account_VerifySuccess_Message
data.value: Great, now that your email address is verified we won't limit your activity. Check out your {0}dashboard{/0} and have some fun!

data.name: Account_Verify_AlreadyDone
data.value: You've already verified your email address with us. So go have some fun!

data.name: Account_Verify_EmailSuccess_Msg
data.value: An email has been sent with a quick link for you to click on. If you don't see the email within a few minutes, check your junk box.

data.name: Account_Verify_InvalidLinkDetails
data.value: Sorry, but the link that brought you here is not correct. If you clicked on the link provided in an e-mail, please try selecting the entire link and pasting it in the address bar of your web browser. If you do that and it still doesn't work, go {0}here{/0} and enter your email address.

data.name: Account_Verify_UserNotFound_Msg
data.value: Sorry but there is nobody in our system with that email address. Please try another address.

data.name: Footer_Copyright
data.comment: {0} is current year

data.name: Footer_SupportLink
data.comment: 0 is link to support

data.name: Header_UserRecognition
data.comment: 0 is the user's name

data.name: MustVerify_Message
data.value: Before we can let you go futher, we need you to verify your email address with us. We sent you an email a while back with a link to follow. If you have it, please open that email and click the link. Otherwise, we can send another email.

data.name: Signup_AlreadySignedUp_Message
data.value: You are currently logged in and have already signed up for Takeoff. To change your account plan or billing info, click "Account" up top.

data.name: Signup_SubscribeChoice_Explanation
data.value: No matter what, your first 30 days are free. You can enter your billing information now or later. The advantage of entering it now is that we won't bug you about it during your trial and you won't have any lapse in service. But you can enter your information later if you want.

data.name: PageTitlePrefix
data.comment: When there is a custom page title, this is inserted before it.

data.name: Signup_Subscribe_BillingErrorExplanation
data.value: There was a problem billing your account. Before you can use Takeoff, we need you to update your billing information. You will then immediately be charged {0}.

data.name: Signup_Subscribe_InTrialExplanation
data.value: Thanks for joining Takeoff. We give the first month for free, so you won't be billed until {0}. By entering your card now you ensure no disruption in service. We're happy to have you!

data.name: Signup_Subscribe_TrialExpiredExplanation
data.value: We hate the break the news, but your Takeoff trial expired on {0}. To continue using Takeoff, you'll have to purchase it. We sure hope you do. You can enter your billing information below.

data.name: Signup_Subscribe_ValidationSummary_Heading
data.value: Your order couldn't be processed. Please address the following:

data.name: Subscribe_CardsAccepted
data.value: Visa, Mastercard, American Express or Discover

data.name: Subscribe_Explanation
data.value: We don't accept POs, checks, or invoices to be paid at a later date. We will email you a receipt each time your card is charged. For your security and peace of mind, we do not store or handle your credit card directly and instead use a 3rd party service. If you have any questions, you can reach us at {0}sales@takeoffvideo.com{/0}. Thanks for your business!

data.name: Account_MainInfo_CurrentPassword_Label
data.comment: /account & /account/maininfo

data.name: Account_MainInfo_CurrentPassword_Tooltip
data.value: Please enter your current password. This is a security measure to prevent someone else from changing your important account information.

data.name: Account_Shared_PageHeading
data.comment: Shown in big letters on all /account pages

data.name: Footer_TwitterFeed_NoDataMsg
data.value: No recent tweets. Check back soon!

data.name: Demo_Explanation
data.value: We like to test things out before committing. And we don't like giving away our email addresss just to do it. So we made it possible for you to try Takeoff without entering any personal information.

data.name: Home_PlansBtn_Text
data.comment: 0 is a span used to format the & with a different font

data.name: Shared_ZoomBtn_Tooltip
data.comment: Generally, the a[title] for thumbnails

data.name: Tour_Assets_Details
data.value: Takeoff's asset section is a great way to transfer and share files with your team. Share scripts, soundtracks, photos, artwork, or any other file you need to create your video.

data.name: Tour_Collaboration_Details
data.value: Takeoff provides a centralized, simple place for you to collaborate on videos as they are produced. Invite team members, share asset files, and upload video versions for review to this private web area.

data.name: Tour_Dashboard_Details
data.value: The hub of Takeoff, your dashboard provides a simple overview of all your productions and activity. Organize all your productions and get a quick peek at what's going on with your projects.

data.name: Tour_Dashboard_SubTitle
data.value: Know what's going on in your production... anywhere, anytime.

data.name: Tour_Mobile_Details
data.value: Takeoff works on iPhone and iPad like a charm. Review and comment on the latest versions of your video in the palm of your hand. How cool is that? Native apps coming soon.

data.name: Tour_Mobile_SubTitle
data.value: Going mobile? Don't skip a beat.

data.name: Tour_Notifications_Details
data.value: Takeoff sends you email notifications for all activity within your productions. Know when a video is ready for review, a teammate has joined, or when a comment has been made. Busy inbox? Don't worry you can even set the frequency and settings to your liking.

data.name: Tour_Review_Details
data.value: Upload a video and let Takeoff's commenting system turn the review process into a pleasure. Comment on the whole video or a specific moment with frame by frame accuracy. The intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to participate, and reduces messy ambiguous feedback.

data.name: Tour_Review_SubTitle
data.value: Fast, accurate video review & timeline-based commenting.

data.name: Tour_Security_Details
data.value: Takeoff is https encrypted for industrial grade privacy. The rules are simple: if you are not on the team, you do not have access. Producers can choose to make the uploaded version downloadable or restrict team members from grabbing it.

data.name: Tour_SignupBtn_Text
data.comment: 0 is span so the & can be in a different font

data.name: Signup_Index_PageHeading
data.value: Which Plan is Right for You?

data.name: Signup_Index_PageTitle
data.comment: Main signup/pricing page

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq2_Answer
data.value: A production is a place in Takeoff for you to collaborate with a specific team on any number of videos and files. Productions generally are associated with a single piece of finished work, where videos are versions, scenes, etc. Only people you invite in have access to your production.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq3_Answer
data.value: When we say "x number of videos", we mean the number of maximum videos that can be uploaded in a given month. The month begins on the same date as your current billing cycle.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq4_Answer
data.value: Assets are files kept in a production that teammates can access. Assets are generally files needed for video production, like scripts and soundtracks. Plans include a maximum total size of assets that can exist at any given time.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq5_Answer
data.value: Yes. Simply click on the "Account" link and you'll see the option.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq5_Question
data.value: Can I change plans at any time?

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq6_Answer
data.value: We can create a custom plan for you if you have large requirements. Just sign up for one of the plans right now to get started. Then e-mail {0}sales@takeoffvideo.com{/0} and we'll switch you over to a custom plan.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq6_Question
data.value: What if I need more videos than your biggest plan allows?

data.name: Signup_Index_PlanVideos_Text
data.comment: 0 is an <em>. 1 is the number of videos allowed

data.name: Signup_Account_PlanNotFound_Message
data.value: There is no plan by that ID. Did you hit a bad link?

data.name: Signup_Account_PlanNotAvailable_Message
data.value: Sorry but that plan is no longer available.

data.name: Signup_Subscribe_PlanNotAvailable_Message
data.value: The plan is no longer available.

data.name: Signup_Sample_Explanation
data.value: We can put together a cool sample production that will help you understand how Takeoff typically works. We'll even write some comments for you. Don't worry, the pre-made videos are free and don't count against your account.

data.name: Signup_Sample_PageHeading
data.value: Would You Like a Sample Production?

data.name: Shared_NoJavascript_Error
data.value: WAIT! Takeoff is a modern dynamic web application and uses a programming language called JavaScript. You have JavaScript disabled right now. To use Takeoff, you need to enable it. Please follow {0}these instructions{/0} and then load Takeoff again. Thanks!

data.name: Signup_Account_EmailExistedButWasDeleted
data.value: That e-mail address was used in a closed account. If this is your e-mail address, please e-mail support@takeoffvideo.com and we will reactivate it.

data.name: Signup_Account_EmailIsActive
data.value: That e-mail address is already in the system. Please sign in if that's your email address.

data.name: Login_SignupLink
data.comment: {0} is link to signup page

data.name: Productions_Create_InvalidImageType_Msg
data.value: The file was not an image we could detect. Try uploading in jpg, png, gif, or tiff format.

data.name: Support_Explanation
data.value: Welcome to Takeoff support. We've laid out a bunch of simple options for you to get the answers to your Takeoff questions.

data.name: Demo_Sample_Explanation
data.value: A production is a secure place for a team to review video. You can create your own productions, but it might be easier to understand Takeoff if we put one together for you. We'll instantly add a few videos and even write some comments for you. You can always delete it later. How about it?

data.name: Demo_Sample_PageHeading
data.value: Welcome! Shall we start with a sample?

data.name: Account_NecessaryInfo_Explanation
data.value: We are missing some information that we need. It'll make your Takeoff experience better. Don't worry, we will never distribute any of your personal information.

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifyWhenNewMember_Label
data.value: Someone is added to my team

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifyWhenNewReplyToAuthoredComment_Label
data.value: Someone replies to one of my comments

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifyWhenNewVideo_Label
data.value: A new video is ready to watch

data.name: Error_Billing_Message
data.value: We are so sorry but an error occured as we processed your order. This happens from time to time. A notification has been sent out to our staff and you'll hear from us very soon. Your card hasn't been charged, so don't worry about that.

data.name: Error_MissingData_Explanation
data.value: Sorry, but we couldn't find what you were looking for. Maybe you entered an incorrect link. Or maybe it has been deleted. Sorry!

data.name: Error_MissingPage_Explanation
data.value: The page you entered could not be found. Perhaps you pasted the url incorrectly?

data.name: Error_NoPermission_Message
data.value: Maybe you entered an incorrect link. Or maybe you got voted out because you didn't sing well last week.

data.name: Error_NoPermission_PageHeading
data.value: Sorry, but you don't have access to this.

data.name: Production_Create_AccountReqd_Message
data.value: So far, you've been a guest in Takeoff. That's cool, but as a guest you can't create your own productions, add teammates, etc. To do that, you need to sign up for an account. Creating an account is free and requires no credit card to start.

data.name: Production_Create_AccountReqd_PageHeading
data.value: You'll Need an Account For This

data.name: Account_LimitReached_Demo_PageTitle
data.comment: Limit reached page for demo accounts

data.name: Account_LimitReached_Guest_Explanation
data.value: Sorry but the account associated with what you trying to do ran into a limit. In order to do this, the account holder needs to upgrade their account. Please contact them and ask them to upgrade.

data.name: Account_LimitReached_Normal_PageTitle
data.comment: Limit reached page for normal account holders

data.name: Production_Details_RequestAccess_FormHeader
data.value: Want to be? We can tell whoever is in charge that you'd like to join this production.

data.name: Production_Details_RequestAccess_PageHeading
data.value: You Aren't a Member of this Production

data.name: Production_MembershipRequestsDisabled_Explanation
data.value: Sorry but you aren't a member of this production and whoever is in charge isn't accepting requests for membership. If possible, try contacting them directly and tell them to add you as a team member.

data.name: Suspended_Account_Guest_Explanation
data.value: There is an issue with the account that this belongs to. The account owner has been notified, so hopefully this production can be accessed again soon.

data.name: Suspended_Account_Guest_PageHeading
data.value: There is a Problem With This

data.name: Account_LimitReachedMsg_VideoUploadCount
data.value: you can't upload more than {0} videos per month

data.name: Production_NotFound_Message
data.value: Sorry, but we couldn't find the production you were looking for. Either it was deleted or you entered an incorrect link. Sorry!

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq7_Answer
data.value: No. You can include an unlimited number of people in your productions. Only you pay for the videos that are uploaded to your productions. If you are a filmmaker, your clients are considered as guests and will not be billed.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq8_Answer
data.value: Currently we accept Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express. We do not accept PayPal. At this time we only accept payments online so we will not be able to accept a P.O., invoice you, or take an order over the phone.

data.name: Signup_Index_Faq8_Question
data.value: What types of payment do you accept?

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifyForMaintenance_Label
data.value: Takeoff will be down for maintainence

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifyPlanChanges_Label
data.value: Takeoff plan prices, included features, or structures change

data.name: Account_Notifications_Alerts_NotifySpecials_Label
data.value: We offer discounts, packages, or products we think you'll like

data.name: Shared_Demo_Banner
data.value: This is a demo. {0}Get full featured Takeoff. No credit card required!{/0}

data.name: Signup_Guest_Explanation
data.value: This will create a free guest account. This is perfect if you simply want to review someone else's video. You won't be able to create your own projects, but you can always upgrade later if you want.

data.name: Signup_Guest_Form_ValidationSummary_Heading
data.value: Your account couldn't be created because:

data.name: Trial_Signup_Explanation
data.value: Until now, you've been completely anonymous. In order to go further, we'll need to create a Takeoff account for you. Don't worry, there is no money involved.

data.name: Trial_Signup_PageHeading
data.value: Let's Take This to the Next Level

data.name: Trial_Signup_ValidationSummary_Heading
data.value: Your account couldn't be created because:
